headline: 4 Security & Safety Stocks to Consider on Promising Industry Trends
summary: Rising awareness for safety and security among people favors the Zacks Security and Safety Services industry's near-term prospects. ALLE, ADT, LIF and ALRM are some notable stocks in the industry.
